in a way that is frightening: Some of the insects were tiny, and others were scarily huge. He's so scarily intelligent that it's difficult to talk to him.
More examplesFewer examplesHis description of the disaster is scarily accurate.Money can be powerful, sometimes scarily so. She seemed scarily calm when I entered her office.This game is violent, with scarily realistic players.I felt scarily unprepared for the journey I was about to make.The country's unemployment figures are already scarily high, and look set to get higher.
